title: XRP Rockets Toward $30: Is It the Next Ethereum-Like 58x Surge?
description: EGRAG CRYPTO suggests a potential 58x surge for XRP, comparing it to Ethereum’s historical performance. Legal clarity and past achievements boost XRP’s compelling trajectory, but caution remains paramount.
